name: Cash furnished discharged committed person, when
text: Upon the discharge or parole of any committed person who has undergone a commitment or sentence of more than one year, the committed person may be furnished by the Hawaii paroling authority, in its discretion, with funds of not more than $200, to meet the committed person's immediate needs.  The expenditures made by the Hawaii paroling authority shall be included among the accounts for cost and maintenance of committed persons. [L 1987, c 338, pt of §3; am L 1997, c 174, §1]
